website_summaries.verdict: This Coleman single-high airbed has many features similar to the Intex model, but with the price difference, no pump, and a meager number of reviews, we'd go with the Intex.
pros: Super-soft plush top gives you a comfortable surface.Antimicrobial finish resists odors, mold, and mildew
ComfortStrong coil construction provides superior support
Suitable for indoor and outdoor use

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: the air mattress appeared with a ball in the center, it happened on a hot day. very comfortable, but bad quality. only used for 20 days.
customer_reviews.author: Daiver Taborda Hoyos

customer_reviews.title: Worst airbed I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: It went flat the first night no matter how many times I inflated it. It took it about an hour to be completely flat never would hold air! Worst airbed I ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Smith

customer_reviews.title: Won't last a year!
customer_reviews.text: Here's the deal. Somewhere in the fine print it says for intermittent use only during the course of the one year warranty. This means like maybe a month out of one year use and you may be okay. In other words, it ain't gonna last a year under constant use. Having said that, the ones made 20 years ago may have lasted that long but these new ones either leak or more commonly blow their shapes out. They are comfortable though and with my bad back they are almost a necessity. I'm lucky if I get a couple months use.
customer_reviews.author: Ebeneezer

customer_reviews.title: This bed was a waste of money and time
customer_reviews.text: This bed was a waste of money and time! The mattress barely holds air for more than an hour and the Shipping cost was outrageous. I’m going to have to buy a different bed this weekend don’t waste your money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Holds air great
customer_reviews.text: We used this in our tent on a week long road trip. Held air great with just a small top off every day. We purchased this mattress because it fit in our two person tent(ALPS Mountaineering Lynx 2-Person Tent). Fits great inside.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Sears

customer_reviews.title: No bag included. Photo is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Mattress worked well and the children were very comfortable. However, the picture shows the mattress comes with a bag attached. This is incorrect. We took it camping and realized that on our way back. Its a bummer since it ends up dirty if you did not take a bag to store it.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Seam blew out in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well the first 3 times it was used. I only had it 4 months and a seam started leaking. I would prefer to take this up with the seller but I can’t find anyway to contact them. With very light use I believe it should last more than 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ji

customer_reviews.title: Toddler bouncy pad
customer_reviews.text: Most people buy this for camping or for the occasional guest who crashes over... I bought it as a portable and affordable bouncy pad for my toddler. Works great, perfect size, great price.. helluva lot cheaper than kiddie bouncy castles. No leaks, haven't had to refill it since we bought it about 4 months ago. It gets regular bouncy (ab)use from a 30 lb toddler. The bed does have a bit of the typical plastic smell to it when we first got it, so air it out before using.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress, but they removed the wrap cover!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third, oldest is probably 10 years and still doesn’t leak. On receiving my third, I am very disappointed to see that Coleman is no longer making the black cover on these that you wrap around for storage. This is a critical piece that holds it together. Even more annoying that they show this in the photo, but have cheapened the product. Even with this cost cutting, they are still great mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Seams popped again!
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these in the past month. I first one popped at seams within a week, second one, same thing but took longer. This is used daily and have other brands last a good 6months to a year. I thought by buying a name brand, it would be better. Not so!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri T.

customer_reviews.title: Went flat the first night
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, ordered this air mattress for camping when it came in I blew it up at home to make sure it had no holes we where good. The first night camping I blew it up and by the middle of the night we where on the ground. I thought maybe the plug had come out, nope it was just flat. The same thing happened night two, I’m glad it was a short camping trip. I grew out the box after I tested it at the house so I can’t return it so we had to throw it out. I do not recommend this product, it did t even stay inflated for 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: angelkt6

customer_reviews.title: would not hold air for 6 hours
customer_reviews.text: Coleman airbed is not what It used to be. I needed a bed for 7 days hunting. It would not hold air for 7 days. I did read the reviews . The fill valve must leak as others had stated. I cant give it any stars if you have to refill everyday for 7 days. Terrible product should not even be sold on Amazon. I gave it a one star or It would not post.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Techy

customer_reviews.title: Why spend thousands of dollars on other types of air mattresses when you can get a great, simple air mattress in the $50 range
customer_reviews.text: I have used this air mattress for quite a wild and consider it of high quality and value. Why spend thousands of dollars on other types of air mattresses when you can get a great, simple air mattress in the $50 range. I am extremely satisfied and would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Eytchison

customer_reviews.title: Quality and durable, but does not come with a pump
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic durable air mattresses, perfect for my kids when we travel (so I don’t have to get an extra hotel room for more beds). The only downside I will say is that it does not come with a pump, and it’s not readily apparent on the packaging. So, We brought this on a trip with us expecting to be able to use it, but weren’t able to do so Dash – because it didn’t have a pump. We will be ready next time though.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan J

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this on two camping trips and I couldn’t be more happier with it, it stays inflated very well and it’s very comfortable. I used a ryobi inflator (18v system, the smaller one that just does inflatables) to fill this and I will tell you now if you use that in combination with this you will only need a small 18v battery for the weekend while you use this. Doesn’t take a lot of power or time to inflate this.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item 6 months went by i opened the bed for the first time and in the middle of the night one of the cells popped and the bed is now useless
customer_reviews.author: Flash

customer_reviews.title: Arrived without the storage bag
customer_reviews.text: This is nearly a duplicate of one we already have (and have been pleased with), but this new one did not arrive with the integrated storage bag. Since it was pictured in the product description, we feel we were misled. The storage bag is a very useful feature. Other than that, we find this air mattress comfortable and durable enough, although we only ever use it indoors. With an older one, we found that over-inflation caused a bubble to form, so we are careful with how much we inflate it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Camping Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Air mattress is considered to be a product with a strong personal taste. This product is not recommended for those who like hard mattresses. When I was sleeping, I had a lot of pain in my back, which made me uncomfortable. It would be nice to read the product description carefully and purchase it. The price is affordable to quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I took this air mattress when I went camping in Vermont. I like these ability of filling it up. During the night I did not lose any air. And it was also easy to flight and fall back up and put it back into its package. I would recommend this common mattress to anybody whether you’re camping sleeping in the backyard or you have guests over. It’s a great price and a great product I would recommend this to anybody
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Weber

customer_reviews.title: Had holes, deflated, not able to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought new from Amazon. Took on a road trip for 8 days and as soon as I blew it up it started leaking. Tried patching holes but there were multiple ones. Had to sleep on the ground during my whole trip. Would not advise buying for camping purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Brae Dyn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't hold up. The inner parts came undone and now there is a large bulge in the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Public Name

customer_reviews.title: A not great product from a normally great brand.
customer_reviews.text: Was comfortable enough when completely inflated. However, that was easier said than done as the mattress lost air fairly quickly. It is a prime example of getting what you pay for. Sorely disappointed in Coleman for such a sub par product. The only redeeming quality is that it was inexpensive and it isnt a huge loss.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: After extensive research I chose two of these for our Coleman popup and feel they are high quality. They have stayed inflated for weeks now as our camper is set up in yard. I got the inflator that goes with it as well and it works great. The rubber is very heavy and the flocking is a bonus. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: jolene

customer_reviews.title: This was a replacement item
customer_reviews.text: I was replacing this which I had borrow and it wound up being damaged. I expected to pay a lot me but was pleasantly surprised by how reasonably priced it was - I can speak of the quality because it was shipped directly to then person I had borrow it from. Since I didn't hear any complaints back I assume it was a good replacement item.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C

customer_reviews.title: Comfy while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: After the first 3 weeks of use, the seams that create the ruffled look on the top of the mattress began to break, causing a massive air pocket in the center of the mattress. This made it extremely uncomfortable to sleep on. I expected something more durable from Coleman.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Single Use
customer_reviews.text: Leaks air after single use. Woke up on ground in the morning. Tried again for two children and wouldn't hold air for 30 mins. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: A. Misra

customer_reviews.title: Went flat on first use
customer_reviews.text: I normally only buy Coleman air mattresses. This one went flat in 4 hours the first time it was used. It has been returned.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Don’t, just don’t
customer_reviews.text: Went through 4 or 5 of these before I finally learned my lesson and went with another company. Every one had the same issue. A huge bubble developed in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: elaine parseghian

customer_reviews.title: Deflated after one use
customer_reviews.text: After one use, started to deflate. Can not find a leak anywhere; sprayed the whole thing with soapy water
customer_reviews.author: tanis bryson

customer_reviews.title: Flat by 3rd night, the worst quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to replace my old camping air mattress, and what a mistake. The first two nights worked perfectly, but the third night it kept deinflating until went all flat and had to sleep in the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Beth San

customer_reviews.title: The best durability I’ve had in a near mattress, ever
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a few months and it’s been lasting really well. It’s an air mattress, how comfortable can it be. Thus far, it’s the best air mattress I’ve had. I will buy another one
customer_reviews.author: KEITH W.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Will always recommend for a quick and pleasant sleeping arrangement. I just wish they didn’t deflate so fast compared to some competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Travis thomas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough, if it had lasted
customer_reviews.text: Lasted only two months of nightly but very quiet sleeper use, which is basically all one needs to say about that.
customer_reviews.author: Bookhound

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I went on a camping trip this past weekend. I was told to bring an air mattress no bigger than a twin size. I came across this and it was excellent! It was comfortable and it was easy to air up. Mind you, it doesn't come with an air pump so I had to use a friend's...but it was definitely smooth and very easy to deflate. I find nothing wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: leaking after using for a few times
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress a year ago, but used only twice. It's now started leaking. Not sure if I can still get replaced/fixed/refunded. If so I'm considering a better rating for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Chunxiao Wu

customer_reviews.title: Good Bed but Misleading Photo
customer_reviews.text: We have a Coleman Queen Quick Bed and like it, so decided to also get two twins. Although the description did state so, one of the 3 photos showed the attached wrapping cover, which is a nice and convenient feature of our Queen Quick Bed. When we received the twins we found they actually DO NOT have this wrapping cover. That was disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie A Kasper

customer_reviews.title: It's adequate
customer_reviews.text: While it is adequate to sleep on for a short time, as many others have reported- this mattress does a poor job of retaining air. Every morning, I wake up on the floor with a mostly deflated mattress under me. It's not punctured anywhere, I've looked. But aside from that, it does the job I wanted it for.
customer_reviews.author: Naraskae

customer_reviews.title: Too big for SUV camping
customer_reviews.text: Would be great for tent camping. But I was on road trip and sleeping in SUV. It took up entire back area with little space for minimal camp gear and luggage. But good product. Slept on it fora full week.
customer_reviews.author: paulrob2

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: Need to stage a house for resale, these worked perfect to set up
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coleman products ROCK!
customer_reviews.text: Coleman makes great products since I can remember! This air mattress is perfect for our two man tent which we use on our "Sleep in the Wilderness" Adventures. For the amazing price it does the job and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Collodel

customer_reviews.title: Unusable, thank goodness I had a pool float
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this twin mattress in June for my son in preparation for a camping trip in July. The day we set up camp he tried inflating mattress to no avail. Mattress had a tear at a seam. Im surprised at the stars it has for all of the bad reviews. Please don't waste ur money on this mattress. Terrible poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Pris N.

customer_reviews.title: Deflates overnight.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. We took it for our camping but was very disappointed. The bed deflated over the night and was like literally sleeping on the flat ground.
customer_reviews.author: Sankar Kuppsamy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: me and my girl friend slept on this for more than a week while we were moving and waiting on the moving company and it wasn't bad doesn't make much noise when moving around. definitely has a rubber/plastic smell to it when you get it out of the box. threw a sheet on it and it was more bearable. even after being inflated that whole time, it still had that smell at the end of the week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good air mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I like this mattress. I can adjust the amount of air to have the mattress conform to my body. Like any vinyl type mattresses, the mattress has to air a bit to release the gases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mattress for the price. We’ve taken it from Florida to Colorado and back, we’ve camped on it, we’ve let the pets sleep on it - it hasn’t let us down yet.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.....
customer_reviews.text: Used twice and then threw it away. Wouldn't hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: durable
customer_reviews.text: just use it for grandson visit and he sleeps well on it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a far more expensive one that inflates w/ a push of a button when my coleman had a seam blow out after 3 years of use! It still held air just fine but had a spot where it bumped up in one spot! After sleeping 1 night on the fancier one, I was ready to go back to sleeping on the seemingly pregnant coleman (off to one side)! I chose to find a new coleman to replace my old one and save the fancy one for guests!
customer_reviews.author: Florence A. Tobias-Eggert

customer_reviews.title: DOA
customer_reviews.text: Took this out of the box last weekend for the first time to use on our camping trip. Would not hold air for more than a few hours. Tried to locate and patch hole(s) but appeared to be many small air leaks. Left in dumpster at campsite. Very disappointing for a Coleman product.
customer_reviews.author: April Leonard

customer_reviews.title: That if you buy at Amazon's going to bug the crap out of you at 4 reviews
customer_reviews.text: This is a great air mattress to have in the trunk of your car to pull out to make love to your girlfriend or boyfriend if your girl or boy her confused or abused or misused or who knows what good luck at the $20 air mattress what do you expect pretty good works everything you want to do except trampoline
customer_reviews.author: roger stock

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 and they both seem to have a leak in them! We have tiny kids using them and they havent jumped or walked on the beds but they lose all of their air within hours.
customer_reviews.author: beezerbrit

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 3 nights. don't buy as it is not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN TOUPS

customer_reviews.title: Great airbed, make sure to let it off gas before use
customer_reviews.text: Excellent airbed, stays full of air. Has strong chemical smell, may want to open it and let it offgas before any trip or use.
customer_reviews.author: Rasa

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The bed is great. Only for stars cause the size was a tiny bit smaller than expected. Other than that it’s okay
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. Impressed with how comfortable they where, they survived kids jumping on them multiple times. Definitely invest in a not man powered pump.
customer_reviews.author: Orlando Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Came with a hole
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to be a good mattress but it came with a hole in it. I tried to blow it up and very quickly realized from the screaming sound that it made, that it had a hole. I bought the mattress because I needed it for a friend, and we literally duct taped the hole shut, which didn't work. Not worth the wasted time, next time I will buy a futon or sleep on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Elona

customer_reviews.title: Best of quality.
customer_reviews.text: Just as described and very good quality. Have purchased Coleman products for years and have never been disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deflated in a month.
customer_reviews.text: Horrible air mattress, it bunched up, and then ripped in a month! Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Glukhoy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We just got this, but the air intake and durability seem awesome. Was very happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kelter

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Mattress
customer_reviews.text: Love this air mattress, very comfortable, any firmness & it holds air, great air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Bettie R.

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Just went camping for three nights, and this mattress was amazing! Held air well, very comfortable, and perfect for two people.
customer_reviews.author: DJLambert

customer_reviews.title: Nice air mattress
customer_reviews.text: Great mattress for the money, well made, looks durable. Comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: L. Michalec

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to have a air pump
customer_reviews.text: Used for camping had deflated night two but it blew back up and two more nights of sleep achieved
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durability and quality
customer_reviews.text: Coleman mattress’s have been the best air mattress I have used over the past ten years. They last longer than most, and most importantly they hold up three time long and durability out lasts the competition hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deflated multiple times in one night DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Bought this air mattress because I already had a pump. Filled it up at home and it held air. Took it out camping and it deflated several times the first night and ended up sleeping on the ground. I would have made a return but it rained the second day of our trip and we threw It out rather than trying to bring it home wet to return it. I would not purchase this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 💘 love the fluffyness
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in th house 🏠 hold loved it..very comfortable..very fluffy ☺
customer_reviews.author: Maria calvillo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This has only been used one time. My nephew slept on it in our RV. For the money, perfect for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: SRB happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Great air mattress
customer_reviews.text: We went camping and slept on this for 2 nights and it stayed nice and inflated the whole trip. Wonder why others had a problem? Worked great for us!
customer_reviews.author: caitlin

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i use this on top of my coleman queen sized cot. The air mattress that came with it leaked air after about 2 years. Ive used this one a few times now and it holds air like a champ (like its supposed to)
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good bed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so when staying over at my cousins house I’m wouldn’t have to share a bed with her and I ended up loving it. It’s obviously not going to be as comfortable as a real mattress but it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bernal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent air mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent air mattress. Easy to put together and blow up.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, sturdy, and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: Amazon had BY FAR the cheapest price for this mattress. I weigh 250 lbs, and this air mattress is very comfortable and held up well on my 3-night camping trip.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maroney

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The children blew it up and they said it was comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: barbara a. bingham

customer_reviews.title: Durable and gets the job done. No pump downside
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our first family camping trip to give some cushion between the ground and us. It held up fine with 2 adults a toddler and shih tzu on it. Definately dont want to sleep bare skin on it as it sticks. Does not come with a pump.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha C.

customer_reviews.title: Sandman
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like sleeping on air mattresses but this one is very nice and comfortable. We use this for camping.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bui

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish this air mattress had a bag to put it into when you were done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Blomquist

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Bad quality. I got a huge ball in the middle. I had an emergency so I had to buy really quick another one... I hope this one last longer.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. F.

customer_reviews.title: Went Flat
customer_reviews.text: This bed went flat when used for the second time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosi Lï¿½pez

customer_reviews.title: Deflates fast ( not intentionally)
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress deflated (with no weight on it) in less than an hour. ( The Intex brand set record at 15 min 4 air mattress in row that deflate quickly. Come on guys! Seal edges. Pool floats last longer. Buy foam mattress
customer_reviews.author: bubba blue

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent I guest
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for friend and he like it so far
customer_reviews.author: Jermaine Mckenley

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Have used this quite a bit in the short time I’ve owned it. Seems to be built pretty well, feels pretty heavy duty and is comfortable. Can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great bed.
customer_reviews.text: Had this a while and have used several times. Very comfortable. Just use my shop vac to blow it up, and easy to deflate. Great bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Best ever for camping. Buy a pump that fills and deflates.
customer_reviews.author: Donna andrews

customer_reviews.title: We have it ready for guest
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for one that did not work, We have not used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Reynaldo Lerma

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: We brought this for camping and it doesnt hold air, It looses air faster than it should be..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for Coleman
customer_reviews.text: This is used on top of .y mattress in .y camper, I love it
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Harmony

customer_reviews.title: Good value for your $$
customer_reviews.text: So far i only used them once, I gotta say for the price I paid..i couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Q

customer_reviews.title: Great for camping as well as at home for guests
customer_reviews.text: Made of high quality material. Doesn't loose pressure. I used it for one week at home without any problems. There was no need to add pressure once the air mattress reaches its full size. It makes a funny noise on hardwood floor though, but this is expected. No noise in the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Arcun Tanju

customer_reviews.title: Misleading name
customer_reviews.text: It served its purpose, but it is NOT a high bed. Don't know they named it that.
customer_reviews.author: Claritza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: DURABLE!!! my three kids jump all night in the tent when we go camping. The tent an the air mattresses double as a bounce house!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and comfortable even in the back of my SUV.
customer_reviews.author: T.E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Grandson used during a recent visit and said he slept very well. It is well made and should last.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Eischen

customer_reviews.title: Product was defective
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was clearly damaged as it wouldn't hold air even for several hours. Product was listed as used but good and was shipped in original packaging
customer_reviews.author: Darren Lee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: This was like throwing away money. The mattress didn't stay inflated at all. Thankfully my friends had an extra sleeping bag, otherwise it would've been a horrible camping experience.
customer_reviews.author: leBrazil

customer_reviews.title: Would Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great price point for this product. Blows up quickly and provides great support, without taking up a ridiculous amount of space (in the house).
customer_reviews.author: Karen Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Comfort while camping.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mattress for camping. We have the rechargable blower, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Great for camping or when you just need a spare bed.
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used it over 3 day weekend camping trip and it held up good. By the last night it could have used a little bit of air put back in it but we didn’t and it was perfectly comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Savana

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Shared this with my daughter for a week of camping and was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instant mattress with good valve design.
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is compact, quick to inflate and sturdy. A very comfortable sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H

product_meta.title: Coleman Quick Bed Single High Airbed Mattress
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR COMFORT: Coil construction contours to body for better support
SOFT FEEL: Velvet-like plush top for more comfort
LEAK-FREE: Dual-sealed valve prevents leaks for all-night firmness
DIMENSIONS: 73 x 53 x 8 in.; fits standard full-size sheets
EASY INFLATING: Compatible with Coleman air bed pumps (sold separately)
